channel.title: Some Kind of "Role List"?
channel.description:
I put role list in quotes because I don't think an actual role list would be a good idea, but something more vague may be helpful--especially to new players. Something like this:
King BD BD BD BD BD ??? ??? ???
I really enjoy this game, but I will say that the biggest hurdle for me starting out was the complete lack of in-game role knowledge--how many good guys are there, how many bad, how many neutral? Further than that, how many good/bad/neutral CAN there be in a game?
Do you think something along these lines would be good for the game?

item.title: Some Kind of "Role List"?
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
To be completely honest, I don’t really think it’s good to have a check-list that Blue Dragon can use to list off all the classes available and then go down that list whenever someone dies.

Having the entire list be random in every game creates the element of surprise. You never know what you’re going to get.
